ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
This package provides an API for querying the distutils metadata written in
the ``PKG-INFO`` file inside a source distriubtion (an ``sdist``) or
a binary distribution (e.g., created by running ``bdist_egg``)
about.summary: Query metadatdata from sdists / bdists / installed packages.

about.description:
This package provides an API for querying the distutils metadata written in
the ``PKG-INFO`` file inside a source distriubtion (an ``sdist``) or
a binary distribution (e.g., created by running ``bdist_egg``)
about.summary: Query metadatdata from sdists / bdists / installed packages.

name: pkginfo
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pkginfo" %}
{% set version = "1.12.1.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/pkginfo-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5cd957824ac36f140260964eba3c6be6442a8359b8c48f4adf90210f33a04b7b

build:
  entry_points:
    - pkginfo = pkginfo.commandline:main
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}

test:
  imports:
    - pkginfo
    - pkginfo.tests
  commands:
    - pip check
    - pkginfo --help
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://code.launchpad.net/~tseaver/pkginfo/trunk
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: Query metadatdata from sdists / bdists / installed packages.
  description: |
    This package provides an API for querying the distutils metadata written in
    the ``PKG-INFO`` file inside a source distriubtion (an ``sdist``) or
    a binary distribution (e.g., created by running ``bdist_egg``)
  doc_url: http://pythonhosted.org/pkginfo/
  dev_url: https://code.launchpad.net/~tseaver/pkginfo/trunk

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jakirkham
    - jankatins
    - mingwandroid
